adDetails: We offer recording for voice overs such as radio commercials, animations, video narrations, and full band recordings. We are able to create original music if need be. We have been in the music business since 2001. www.GasPumpRecords.com Let us know what your project is for pricing. Usual price for projects is $60 for the first hour and $40 for each additional hour. Our facility is close to Guitar Center in Concord.
